discourse_list.title: The choice is clear: Vote or face backlog

content.content: Hey folks, I’m sorry to be sending out this call to vote for the second time in as many weeks, but it is truly that important. The weekly exec still needs a good chunk of MKR to pass! Normally we wouldn’t be worrying too much about this on a Monday, but today the Monthly Governance Cycle MIP is slated to go up as well. Delays could cause that and this upcoming Friday’s executive to be delayed . Plus, this exec is chalk full of important protocol changes like adding YFI-A to Liq 2.0 , adding some burn  to our increasing Surplus Buffer, and keeping our rates and debt ceilings competitive  so we can continue on the Road to 10B DAI . And since they went over so well last time…  MKR Holders do your thing!
content.GPT-summary: The author is urging MKR holders to vote for the weekly exec, which needs a good chunk of MKR to pass. The Monthly Governance Cycle MIP is also slated to go up, and delays could cause that and the upcoming Friday's executive to be delayed. The exec contains important protocol changes, and the author is asking MKR holders to do their thing.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Let’s Gooooooo Maker Community–let’s make it happen!
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
